title: 90 Day Fiance star Evelin Villegas blasts fiance Corey Rathgeber
text:
Their relationship has been chronicled on the first season of 90 Day Fiance: The Other Way.

But it seems there is trouble in paradise for Evelin Villegas and her fiance, Corey Rathgeber.

Evelin blasted her husband-to-be over Instagram after he spent time in Las Vegas with season six star, Larissa Dos Santos Lima, in what both parties insisted was a completely platonic meet-up.

Angry: Evelin Villegas took to Instagram on Thursday to blast her fiance Corey Rathgeber for spending time with season six's Larissa Dos Santos Lima

On Wednesday, Larissa shared that she met up with Corey in Las Vegas and chronicled their escapades having drinks and playing slot machines.

In the lengthy Instagram live video Evelin addressed the meet-up and took aim at both of them.

'Corey is hanging out with Larissa right now, as all of you can see. It makes me a little upset and I’ll explain why,' she told her followers. 'Because it’s not that he is just hanging out with a cast member. That’s a date, basically. It’s messed up.'

Though she insists she does not have a problem with the divorcee she was quick to call her some rude names.

What sparked outrage: On Wednesday, Larissa shared that she met up with Corey in Las Vegas and chronicled their escapes having drinks and playing slot machines, Evelin called Larissa a 'friggen whore'

'It’s cool. I love Larissa; I always did. I still like her. But the problem is she’s making fun of it,' she said. 'She’s a friggen whore. Because women don’t do that to other women.'

The 26-year-old added 'She should be more respectful toward other women. She’s making fun of somebody else, of a man who is supposed to be taken… Does she think about my feelings? Corey is losing it with this show. I don’t even know who he is anymore.'

This prompted Corey to post a tribute to his fiance and insist that she has his heart.

Speaking directly to his fiance, he said, 'Evelin I love you from the bottom of my heart I always will! You are the world's most beautiful and amazing women I could ever ask for.'

I love you: This prompted Corey to post a tribute to his fiance and insist that she has his heart. Speaking directly to his fiance he said 'Evelin I love you from the bottom of my heart I always will! You are the world's most beautiful and amazing women I could ever ask for'

'Evelin is my world. I'm attracted to Evelin not to her. She deserves the best and I love her with all my heart.'

He seemed to clear up any worries Evelin had about a romance with Larissa.

'We met up as friends, that's how it is. For those saying anything more about that subject are wrong and creating rumors,' he said.

Whole world: 'Evelin is my world. I'm attracted to Evelin not to her. She deserves the best and I love her with all my heart'

Larissa speaks: She said 'Nothing happened, not even a kiss. I posted our picture because it was an innocent date and we are both adults'

The Brazil native also fired back on her Insta stories in a lengthy note.

She said 'Nothing happened, not even a kiss. I posted our picture because it was an innocent date and we are both adults.'

Larissa also said that Evelin needs to 'talk to her man… if she believes she is in a relationship.'

The couple are not allowed to comment on the status of their relationship while the show airs.

The brunette beauty appeared on season six of the show with her ex-husband Colt Johnson. She recently announced she split from her beau Eric Nichols.
description:
Evelin Villegas took to Instagram on Thursday to blast her fiance Corey Rathgeber for spending time with season six's Larissa Dos Santos Lima.
Corey later insisted it was platonic.
